data.title: Goalpara Law College
data.text:
Welcome to Goalpara Law College

Goalpara Law College, established in the year 1987 is one of the finest “Centre of Legal Education” of lower Assam.. It is situated over Eco friendly atmosphere on the outskirt of Goalpara town at Bhalukdubi, The College stands to fulfill the long -standing idea mooted by six Advocates of Goalpara namely Late Guru Charan Das, Late Biswanath Nath, Late Tohidur Rahman, Late Keshab Ranjan Nath, Prabhat Nath and Sri Jiten Das. Goalpara Law College aims to facilitate the legal education among the aspiring students who intends to pursue law degree. This centre of legal education set up in uniformity with other reputed Law Colleges. The college imparts 3 years LLB course under Gauhati University. The college is duly affiliated by the Bar Council of India (BCI), New Delhi and approved by department of higher education, Govt. of Assam.. Read More
